question: Which of the following statements are true for Jnanpith Award?
option1: Presented annually by the Bharatiya Jnanpith
option2: Awarded to Indian writers writing in Indian languages mentioned in the Eighth Schedule of the Constitution
explanation: Jnanpith Award is an annual award bestowed by Bharatiya Jnanpith to Indian writers who have written in Indian languages mentioned in the Eighth Schedule of the Constitution.
